hotelchain

Class ReservationManagerTextInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotelchain.TextInterface
      • hotelchain.GuestRegistrationTextInterface
        • hotelchain.ReservationManagerTextInterface

  • public class ReservationManagerTextInterface
extends GuestRegistrationTextInterface
    Provides a text-based user interface towards a HotelChain's reservation management system. Extends GuestRegistrationTextInterface as this class extends a GuestRegistrationTextInterface with reservation management options.
    Author:
    Joost Janssen

      • ReservationManagerTextInterface

        public ReservationManagerTextInterface(ReservationManager _reservationManager,
                               GuestRegistration _guestRegistration)
        Constructs an instance of a textual reservation management interface, extending the GuestRegistration textual interface.
        Parameters:
        _reservationManager - Reservation manager this class provides a text-based interface for.
        _guestRegistration - Guest registration providing information to the reservation manager.

      • showFindReservationID

        private int showFindReservationID(int guestID)
        Finds a reservation ID based on a given guest ID. If multiple matches, asks for reservation selection.
        Parameters:
        guestID - Guest ID to use as search criterium for reservation.
        Returns:
        Returns a reservation ID as indicated by user input. Returns -1 if no reservation was found, -99 if multiple reservations were found and displayed

      • showChooseHotel

        private Hotel showChooseHotel()
        Displays the Choose Hotel screen of this interface.
        Returns:
        Returns the Hotel indicated by user input.

      • showGetDesiredDate

        private java.util.Calendar showGetDesiredDate(java.lang.String time)
        Displays the Indicate Desired Date screen of this interface.
        Parameters:
        time - The current date.
        Returns:
        Returns the desired date as indicated by user input.

      • showGetBridalDesired

        private boolean showGetBridalDesired(Hotel hotel,
                           java.util.Calendar startDate,
                           java.util.Calendar endDate)
        Displays the Indicate Bridalsuite Desired screen of this interface.
        Parameters:
        hotel - Desired Hotel to be reserved.
        startDate - Desired start date of reservation.
        endDate - Desired end date of reservation.
        Returns:
        Returns whether the bridal suite is desired as indicated by user input.

      • printReservation

        private void printReservation(Reservation res)
        Prints information of a given Reservation to the screen.
        Parameters:
        res - Reservation whose information is to be printed.

      • checkForRemovedGuests

        private void checkForRemovedGuests()
        Checks whether there are currently no reservations booked by guests who were removed from the system. Moves any reservations that are booked by a removed guest to the relative archive.

      • convertInputToDate

        private java.util.Calendar convertInputToDate(java.lang.String input)
        Converts a given user input to a date in Calendar format.
        Parameters:
        input - User input.
        Returns:
        Returns a date in Calendar format.
